ED_Title: Role of science and technology in the context of international security and disarmament
ED_DecisionText:
At its 51st plenary meeting, on 5 December 2016, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee,  decided to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-second session the item entitled “Role of science and technology in the context of international security and disarmament”.

(See A/71/449, para. 7; A/71/PV.51)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
